PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Indeed , DPP - based conjugated polymers have achieved impressive PCEs up to 9% by the combination of DPP and various electron - donating building blocks.

Let's think step by step.

```
| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCEs |
| DPP |
| electron-donating building blocks |
```
In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PCEs (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. DPP (Dendritic Polymers)
3. electron-donating building blocks (a class of materials used in the synthesis of conjugated polymers)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

```
| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCEs |
| DPP |
```
The following entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties:

1. "electron-donating building blocks" - This refers to a class of materials used in the synthesis of conjugated polymers, but it does not describe a specific property of the materials.

The remaining entities, "PCEs" and "DPP", clearly refer to material properties and are presented in the table above.
